sys_hub_flow.description: Once the request is submitted, we would like to automate the creation of a vehicle tracker as well as all activities associated with the request process such as approval and delivery. The flow should be triggered when the Service Catalog is submitted. A Vehicle Tracker containing information from the catalog item is automatically created. An approval to the Loaner Vehicle Approver group is attached to the RITM ticket. Once at least one approver approves, a Delivery task is then created and assigned to the Vehicle Delivery Group. Once the delivery task is closed the RITM ticket needs to be closed.

The flow should be triggered when the Service Catalog is submitted. A Vehicle Tracker containing information from the catalog item is automatically created. An approval to the Loaner Vehicle Approver group is attached to the RITM ticket. Once at least one approver approves, a Delivery task is then created and assigned to the Vehicle Delivery Group. Once the delivery task is closed the RITM ticket needs to be closed.
